about_the_game:
Note: this Bonus Content pack is a Zip archive. You will have to open it from your local Steam folder.

This free DLC includes :

- The artbook ASA: Making A Game On My Own, in PDF format, which looks back at the creation of the game in 2012 by its solo developer. Contains the more or less 900 images that were used as environment backgrounds, Philip Forté's diary, and many other details.

- The original soundtrack of ASA composed by Stélian Derenne (mp3), and an alternate soundtrack by Python Blue.

- The original game ASA: A Space Adventure, before its remastered version, which will allow you to compare the two versions (Windows only). Developed with Adventure Maker in the early days of independent games, ASA is the game that brought The Black Cube series to life!

- The 2011: A Space Adventure short film (Vimeo Staff Picks), the game cover, wallpapers.

ASA is a 2d adventure game based on still images (point and click type) that is played in first person view (Myst-like), initially developed in 2012 by a single person. The game was remastered in 2015 in a new game engine, in HD, and translated into new languages, with the help of developer Andrea Rinaldi.
